channel.title: Npc model preloading help
channel.description: well i have some npc's models loaded through client hax's way but the item models and gfx models load nicely but the npc models are weird, i have to relog for the model of the npc to show. client is a 317 deob.

item.title: Npc model preloading help
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“Hypocryte, post:2, topic:330554”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=426930.msg3135392#msg3135392 date=1266898983]
well i have some npc’s models loaded through client hax’s way but the item models and gfx models load nicely but the npc models are weird, i have to relog for the model of the npc to show. client is a 317 deob.
[/quote]
Then preload the correct models…[/quote]
you sir are a complete reTARD. i am pre loading the correct models. read what is asked before you post.

Read full topic
